settings.heading: Leading the Way in Sustainable Fashion
settings.desc: Zero Restriction is at the forefront of sustainable fashion, recognized for our pioneering upcycling techniques. We proudly made the shortlist for the BFC/Vogue Designer Fashion Fund in both 2021 and 2022, and we were thrilled to receive the BFC Fashion Trust Fund in those years as well.

In March 2022, our founder Anna received Innovate UK’s Women in Innovation Award, a program aimed at empowering visionary women to achieve their business goals and foster change through innovative ideas, while also promoting gender diversity in the UK’s innovation sector. Anna's innovative proposal for a comprehensive textile sorting and regeneration system has been hailed as a potential solution to the UK's textile waste crisis. We are dedicated to closing the loop on cotton production by reclaiming materials and ensuring that the UK does not export, degrade, or send to landfill any materials that could be reused.
